```lean4
theorem putnam_2001_a5
: ∃! an : ℤ × ℕ, let (a, n) := an; a > 0 ∧ n > 0 ∧ a^(n+1) - (a+1)^n = 2001 := by
  use (15, 4)
  constructor
  · constructor
    · norm_num
    · constructor
      · norm_num
      · norm_num
  rintro ⟨a, n⟩ ⟨ha, hn, h⟩
  have h₁ : a > 0 := ha
  have h₂ : n > 0 := hn
  have h₃ : a^(n+1) - (a+1)^n = 2001 := h
  have h₄ : a ≤ 46 := by
    by_contra! h₅
    have h₆ : a ≥ 47 := by linarith
    have h₇ : a^(n+1) - (a+1)^n > 2001 := by
      have h₈ : a^(n+1) ≥ 47^(n+1) := by
        exact pow_le_pow_of_le_left (by linarith) h₆ (n+1)
      have h₉ : (a+1)^n ≤ (47+1)^n := by
        exact pow_le_pow_of_le_left (by linarith) (by linarith) n
      have h₁₀ : 47^(n+1) - (47+1)^n > 2001 := by
        have h₁₁ : n ≥ 1 := by linarith
        have h₁₂ : 47^(n+1) ≥ 47^2 := by
          exact pow_le_pow_right (by linarith) (by linarith)
        have h₁₃ : (47+1)^n ≤ (47+1)^n := by
          exact le_refl ((47+1)^n)
        have h₁₄ : 47^(n+1) - (47+1)^n > 2001 := by
          have h₁₅ : 47^(n+1) - (47+1)^n ≥ 47^2 - (47+1)^1 := by
            have h₁₆ : 47^(n+1) ≥ 47^2 := by
              exact pow_le_pow_right (by linarith) (by linarith)
            have h₁₇ : (47+1)^n ≤ (47+1)^1 := by
              exact pow_le_pow_of_le_right (by linarith) (by linarith)
            omega
          omega
        omega
      omega
    omega
  interval_cases a <;> norm_num at h₃ ⊢
  <;> rcases n with (_ | _ | _ | _ | n) <;> simp_all [pow_succ]
  <;> ring_nf at h₃ ⊢ <;> omega
```

    · norm_num

      · norm_num
      · norm_num
  rintro ⟨a, n⟩ ⟨ha, hn, h⟩
  have h₁ : a > 0 := ha
  have h₂ : n > 0 := hn
  have h₃ : a^(n+1) - (a+1)^n = 2001 := h
  have h₄ : a ≤ 46 := by
    by_contra! h₅
    have h₆ : a ≥ 47 := by linarith
    have h₇ : a^(n+1) - (a+1)^n > 2001 := by
      have h₈ : a^(n+1) ≥ 47^(n+1) := by
        exact pow_le_pow_of_le_left (by linarith) h₆ (n+1)
      have h₉ : (a+1)^n ≤ (47+1)^n := by

import Mathlib

open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_2001_a5
: ∃! an : ℤ × ℕ, let (a, n) := an; a > 0 ∧ n > 0 ∧ a^(n+1) - (a+1)^n = 2001 := by
  use (25, 4)
  constructor
  · norm_num
  · rintro ⟨a, n⟩ ⟨ha, hn, h⟩
    have h₁ : a > 0 := ha
    have h₂ : n > 0 := hn
    have h₃ : a ^ (n + 1) - (a + 1) ^ n = 2001 := h
    have h₄ : a ≤ 50 := by
      by_contra! h₅
      have h₆ : a ^ (n + 1) - (a + 1) ^ n ≥ 50 ^ (n + 1) - 51 ^ n := by
        gcongr <;> omega
      have h₇ : 50 ^ (n + 1) - 51 ^ n ≥ 2001 := by
        have h₈ : n ≥ 1 := by linarith
        have h₉ : 50 ^ (n + 1) ≥ 50 ^ 2 := by
          apply Nat.pow_le_pow_of_le_right
          linarith
          linarith
        have h₁₀ : 51 ^ n ≤ 51 ^ n := by linarith
        have h₁₁ : 50 ^ (n + 1) - 51 ^ n ≥ 2001 := by
          cases n with
          | zero => contradiction
          | succ n =>
            norm_num at *
            induction n with
            | zero =>
              norm_num at *
              <;> omega
            | succ n ih =>
              simp_all [Nat.pow_succ, Nat.mul_sub_left_distrib]
              <;> ring_nf at *
              <;> omega
        linarith
      omega
    interval_cases a <;> norm_num at h₃ ⊢
    <;>
    rcases n with (_ | _ | _ | _ | n) <;>
    norm_num at h₃ ⊢ <;>
    ring_nf at h₃ ⊢ <;>
    omega
